title: GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills
headline: GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills
subtitle: New Mission Creator
content:
The new Mission Creator provides extensive tools for you to create and publish your own missions.

Set behaviors, choose from a range of objective types, add minigames, create shootouts and stealth sections, and more.

You can also customize the Mission Creator with persistent settings applied to your profile. Start creating now from the Online tab of the Pause Menu.
